title: Integrative Health Education | Ohio State College of Medicine
description: Here is some info from Ohio State - improving lives through excellence in research, education and patient care.
sitename: The Ohio State University College of Medicine
cleaned_text: Education is the key to continually improving high quality, evidence-based integrative care. Ohio State Integrative Health provides a rich variety of educational opportunities in integrative health and wellness for all levels. [Programs for healthcare professionals] Programs for healthcare professionals - - Integrative Health Training in Family Medicine Residency [Programs for medical students] Programs for medical students - Advanced Competency In Integrative Health For 4th year Medical Students - Integrative Health Training Clerkship [Programs for undergraduate students] Programs for undergraduate students - Minor in Integrative Approaches to Health and Wellness - Internship/Independent Study
